participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Ambitious and sociable, Emily is focused on her goals and enjoys being involved in school activities.
participant_1.background: my current goal is to run a k. i make straight as in school. i won homecoming queen this year. when i grow up i want to be a physical therapist. i am currently in high school.

participant_2.name: Max
participant_2.personality: Playful and imaginative, Max enjoys expressing himself through songs and has a love for sweets.
participant_2.background: i like to talk but people have a hard time understanding. i like to look at blocks and sing about letters. i like to eat chocolate candy. when i grow up i want to be a dog.

content.text: I'm doing well. Got a date tonight.
